name: Ylvar
description:
Play as nordic girl Tuva in her quest to rescue her brother. Deal with questions of life and death.

Experience the rustic setting through a set of hand-drawn backgrounds and comic graphics.

This game is part of my "One Game a Week" streak, so there are some caveats: There is not much content, there is not much gameplay, there is no voice acting etc.

The game should last around fifteen minutes.

I would appreciate any feedback you have:

https://twitter.com/talecrafter

stephan.hoevelbrinks@craftinglegends.com

http://www.craftinglegends.com/

You can make videos / "Let's Play"s of this game however you like.
